contact_name: Eurostat, the statistical office of the European Union
description: Data are derived from the Eurostat R statistics (table: rd_e_berdind). Until 2009, definition of the ICT sector is based on NACE Rev. 1.1 classification as follows: ICT_TOT - ICT Total (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333 + 5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) ICT_M - ICT Manufacturing (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333) ICT_S - ICT Services (5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) Data are available for the following classes: 30, 313, 32, 332, 333, 642, 72.
title: R&D expenditure (BERD) of businesses in ICT sector as % of total R&D expenditure
name: Q35XGgQibJLzMf3mhepQ
contact_address: Joseph Bech building, 5 Rue Alphonse Weicker, L-2721 Luxembourg
rdf:
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:ecodp="http://open-data.europa.eu/ontologies/ec-odp#" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:skos="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#">
  <dcat:Dataset rdf:about="http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/products-datasets/-/tin00087">
    <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://eurovoc.europa.eu/100150"/>
    <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://eurovoc.europa.eu/100160"/>
    <dct:subject rdf:resource="http://eurovoc.europa.eu/100147"/>
    <dcat:theme rdf:resource="http://eurovoc.europa.eu/6140"/>
    <dct:title xml:lang="en">R&D expenditure (BERD) of businesses in ICT sector as % of total R&D expenditure</dct:title>
    <dct:title xml:lang="fr">Dépenses de R&D des entreprises du secteur des TIC en pourcentage des dépenses R&D totales</dct:title>
    <dct:title xml:lang="de">FuE-Ausgaben von Unternehmen des IKT Sektors in % der gesamten FuE Ausgaben</dct:title>
    <dct:identifier>tin00087</dct:identifier>
    <dct:description xml:lang="en">Data are derived from the Eurostat R statistics (table: rd_e_berdind). Until 2009, definition of the ICT sector is based on NACE Rev. 1.1 classification as follows: ICT_TOT - ICT Total (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333 + 5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) ICT_M - ICT Manufacturing (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333) ICT_S - ICT Services (5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) Data are available for the following classes: 30, 313, 32, 332, 333, 642, 72.</dct:description>
    <dct:description xml:lang="fr">Les données sont tirées des statistiques Eurostat R (table: rd_e_berdind). Jusqu''en 2009, la définition du secteur des TIC est basée sur la NACE Rév. 1.1: Total TIC (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333 + 5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) TIC - industrie manufacturière (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333) TIC - services (5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) Les données sont disponibles pour les classes: 30, 313, 32, 332, 333, 642, 72.</dct:description>
    <dct:description xml:lang="de">Daten werden von Eurostat FuE Statistiken abgeleitet (Tabelle: rd_e_berdind). Bis 2009 erfolgte die Definition des IKT Sektors aufgrund von NACE Rev. 1.1: ICT Sektor (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333 + 5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) ICT Herstellung (30 + 313 + 32 + 332 + 333) ICT Dienstleistungen (5184 + 5186 + 642 + 72) Daten sind für folgende Klassen verfügbar: 30, 313, 32, 332, 333, 642, 72.</dct:description>
